long_description: Discover the wonder of a Wisconsin winter! Ski, slide, skate, snowmobile throughout the Badger State. Author: Candice Gaukel Andrews. Softcover; 270 pages; black-and-white photos. Big Earth Publishing; copyright 2006. Winter sports information from skiing to dog sledding. Listings for attractions, restaurants, lodging and more. Holiday and winter festivals statewide.
short_description: Discover the wonder of a Wisconsin winter! Ski, slide, skate, snowmobile throughout the Badger State.
